trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Cape Canaveral
There were no other sightings in Cape Canaveral on or around April 1st 1986
divs: Sighting DetailsI was around to see the shuttle lift off when I saw an egg shaped ufo, almost like an almond out of its shell. It changed shape into a sphere and light sped away. About the same time...Disney filmed a movie called FLIGHT OF THE NAVIGATOR.... watch that movie and tell me NASA doesn't have UFO technology.
Summary: NUT SHELL UFO IN FLORIDA IN THE 1980'S
